front.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Information Technology - Telecommunications and Information Exchange Between Systems - Local and Metropolitan Area Networks - Specific Requirements - Part 11: Wireless LAN Medium Access Control (MAC) and Physical Layer (PHY) Specifications

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.keyword: counter mode with cipher-block chaining message authentication code protocol (CCMP)
front.abstract: This revision specifies technical corrections and clarifications to IEEE 802.11-1999 as reaffirmed in 2003 for wireless local area networks (WLANS) as well as enhancements to the existing MAC and PHY functions.
